result.execSummary:
The defendant Deangelo M. Jones was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manufacture/Deliver Heroin(>3-10g) [Modifiers: Conspiracy to Commit], a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(d)2.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:38 p.m. Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 14cf132, 15cf91, 14fo813, 14fo814. Court statement to jury trial. All parties in receipt/review of PSI. Chernin statement trespass/vandalism/escape on page 4 of PSI - Chernin states that no cases existed on CCAP - Defendant stated charges are not his. Court finds there are no proof that such history exists for this defendant and matter should not be considered for purposes of sentencing. Neither party intends to call witnesses today. State moves to dismiss but read-in 15cf91 - Granted. State moves to dismiss 14fo814 and 14fo813 - Granted. Schiek/Chernin/Defendant statement to Court on sentencing read by Attorney Chernin/Court statement on sentencing. Chernin files Defendant's statement. 
Court Sentence
Prison - 6 years --Initial Confinement - 3 years; Extended Supervision - 3 years
Jail Credit - 243 days
Defendant is not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program or Substance Abuse Program
CC/Supervision Fees
AODA or mental health treatment deemed appropriate by PO
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO
Appeal rights given
Adj. 3:29 p.m.
Copies of PSI to DA and Attorney Chernin
along with proposed jury instructions and defendants's motion in limines - never previously filed with clerk and not given to clerk until 10-26-15
guilty
Exhibits 1A, 2A, 2B, 3A, 4 and 5 attached. Exhibits 1, 2 and 3 (sealed in plastic) retained in Clerk of Court Exhibit storage.
Sentencing hearing at 12-11-2015 02:30 pm

Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
1:56 - Jurors back in - verdict reached - Jury finds defendant guilty and that the amount was equal to or greater than 3 grams. Jurors polled.  Jurors thanked and excused 2pm 
Court statement - previous motion denied -  regarding sentencing - Schiek request PSI - Chernin statement - Court will order PSI -  Court directs counsel to chambers for date and 15CF91 and the 2 remaining ordinances - 
Bond revoked  - Defendant remanded until sentencing

Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Counsel to look at 3A to decide which portions, if any - to go in - court recess for counsel to decide on  3a and all exhibits will go in together.   1:36

Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

State calls K.F/sworn/Direct- witness IDs defendant - shows state's exhibit 2(wire transfer receipts - 6-28-14 and 7-9-14) ,shows exhibit 1(wire transfer receipt of 7-4-14)- offered/received - actual copies marked 1A, 2A and 2B to correspond with originals . Shows state's exhibit 3 (phone) offered/received - shows exhibit 3A -(contents of phone) - side bar - continue direct shows states exhibit 4 (DJE for witness 14CF131) offered/recieved /Cross by Defense/Redirect - Court recess 9:51 Back on record - 10:05 - jurors back in - 
State calls  Investigator Kyle Parish/sworn/direct - shows states exhibit 5 (money gram record) - witness IDs defendant - side bar - continue direct - side bar - continue direct/Cross by Defense - State offers exhibit 5 and any not previously received - Court now receives all exhibits - State rests - Jurors out 10:58 - still on record - Chernin statement - will not be making motion to dismiss- Court statement - Chernin statement off record briefly-11:01 back on record 11:03- Defendant will not be testifying - Court questions defendant - Waiver of right to testify  free and voluntary - jurors back in - 11:11-
 Defense rests - Court statement to jurors - releases for lunch - 11:14 - informal instruction discussion - instructions to be given - back on record 11:33 - instructions to be given - 100,103,147,145 as modified,148,150,155,157,162,170,190,195,255 as modified,300,325,570 as modified,160,460,480, 550 and verdict forms - Court recess for lunch- 11:45
Quashing Writ/Order to Produce

Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Back on record 1:11pm  - All parties present - witnesses sequestered - Court statement to witnesses being called out of order due to medical issue- no objection - jurors in 
State calls W.M/Sworn/Direct - Witness IDs defendant -/Cross by Defense/Redirect/ReCross -  jurors out - Schiek statement writ on next witness - Court quashes writ for wintess C.H. - 
Back on record 1:50 - jurors in -State calls C.H/sworn/direct - witness IDs defendant /Cross by  Defense/Redirect/Recross- side bar 
2:38 - Court statement to jurors  adjourning for the day- will resume at 8:30 - jurors excused - remain on record for discussion regarding further testimony -- adj 2:45

8:31 a.m. In Chambers -Defendant Deangelo Jones and Attorney Michael Chernin and attorney present along with DA Schiek all present - Stipulation as to priors on defendant and witnesses. Chernan statement  - Last/best offer to defendant placed on record - declined by defendant - waiver free and voluntary.  Chernan statement to diagnosis of defect (mental health) - Court questions defendant. Court statement - only 14CF132 to be held today. 8:42 am

9:12 - Introduction of Counsel - Schiek -

10:17 - Peremptory strikes commencing  - side bar
10:30  - 12 jurors selected to serve on trial - balance of jurors excused - advised next call back date - 12 jurors sworn excused - Court statement to side bars - and strike sheet - names put in wrong place - Court statement to jury taking notes- Court will not allow jury to take notes- - recess 10:42

Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court attorney Michael L. Chernin appears telephonically.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 15cf91 (PH), 14FO813 and 14F0814.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

of Pretrial Conference held March 17, 2015

08:46 am - Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in custody.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 14fo813-814 and 15cf91.  Defendant taken into custody prior to hearing.  Jury Trial had been scheduled to commence on today's date and was adjourned on Tuesday, April 21, 2015.  Toran motions the court to withdraw from 14cf132.  Court grants motion.  State plans to file motion to forfeit cash bond posted on this cash due to new charges, 15cf91.  Bail continued.  Status conference scheduled for April 30, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
to adjourn

11:31 am - Attorney James Edgar Toran in court, appearing telephonically with leave of the court.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Toran filed a motion to adjourn the jury trial with the DA's office, received via fax this morning.  Court addresses Attorney Toran - Toran states has been in court continuously the past two weeks - legal assistance was not available - has not had time to prepare/meet with defendant - Defendant has not met financial obligations to Toran.  Court/Schiek statement to status of case.  Schiek states there has not been a formal demand for discovery filed by Toran.  Court grants the motion to adjourn the jury trial.  A scheduling conference is scheduled for this Thursday at 8:30 a.m.  Toran to appear in person with defendant and will discuss scheduling of adjourned trial.  Bail continued.
from DA Schiek to Atty Toran
Ad Testificandum and Order to Sheriff
from Atty Toran

01:45 pm - Attorney James Edgar Toran in court, telephonically with leave of the court.  Jodie L. Bednar appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant does not appear.  Also calling 14fo813-814.  Case currently set for jury trial.  As of today's date there is no resolution. Bail continued.

03:16 pm - Defendant Deangelo M. Jones in court with attorney James Edgar Toran.  Michael W. Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also calling 14fo813-814.  Schiek states there is not a resolution in place - requests jury trial date.  Bail continued.  Jury trial scheduled for April 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
